mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_orders (id, user_id, status, total_amount, ordered_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{totalAmount}, #{orderedAt})

INSERT INTO order_order_items (order_id, product_id, product_name, price, quantity) VALUES
(#{orderId}, #{item.productId.value}, #{item.productName}, #{item.price}, #{item.quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.user_id, o.status, o.total_amount, o.ordered_at, oi.product_id, oi.product_name, oi.price, oi.quantity FROM order_orders o JOIN order_order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.ordered_at DESC

SELECT o.id, o.user_id, o.status, o.total_amount, o.ordered_at, oi.product_id, oi.product_name, oi.price, oi.quantity FROM order_orders o JOIN order_order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id WHERE o.id = #{id} AND o.user_id = #{userId}
